description: Scan knowledge density across all domains. Identifies areas with insufficient experience (VOID/SPARSE) to reveal the agent's blindspots.

configuration.query: FROM knowledge-domains | EVAL density = memory_count * avg_confidence, staleness_days = DATE_DIFF("day", last_updated, NOW()), status = CASE(density < 1.0, "VOID", density < 5.0, "SPARSE", "DENSE") | SORT density ASC
